html:
It smells fucking terrible
Rag for all kinds of surfaces
Wiped in shit and urine
Smells fucking terrible
On the whole hallway
There is a smell
It’s normal here
That’s local culture
Floors need to be clean somehow
They have no other way
Only universal rag
For all kinds of surfaces
It makes me nauseous
And the supper is soon
They could use some cleaning products
For the bucket of slops
title: Smell
